page.title: 10Village amenities-Arlington.
page.content: {Public Utilities:}Electricity, Water.{ {Religion:}Anglican Parish Church, one of three in care of Vicar of Wilmington; Communion twice weekly, Evensong monthly. {Social Amenities:}Public house and small village hall needing replacement. Mobile library calls alternate Mondays. {Communications:}A public telephone kiosk, Mail collections twice daily from small early Victorian wall box. Daily bus for school children. Weekly Community bus for shoppers alternately to Hailsham and Seaford on Thursdays. {Distance to other Amenities:} 1.5 miles - Post office; garage service and petrol; railway station. 3 miles - Doctor; junior school. 4 miles - Chemist; Dentist; Bank; supermarket; senior school.
